text: Willelm kyng gret mine eorlas and ealle mine þegnas on þan sciran þær Ealdred arcebiscop hæfþ land ofer and land inne freondlice.

And ic kyþe eow þæt ic wille he beo his biscoprices weorþe and his socne tolles and teames binnan burh et butan ofer his men and ofer his manna land on mine socne swa full and swa forþ swa he firmest hæfde on Eadwerdes dæge kinges mines mæges on eallan þingan.
And ic nelle nanan men geþolian þat ynn fram hande drafe ænig þæra þinga þæs gehennd rihte habbene ah ne þat man him æt ænigan þingan misbeode nenan his manna.
And gif hit ænig man deð frencisc oððe flemisc oððe englisc gekyþe me fore and ic him cæde sone fulle bote.
